Method Detail

getInterface

public java.lang.Class getInterface()
Returns the interface class for this component.

getConcreteInstance

public java.lang.Object getConcreteInstance()
This method will return a concrete instance of this component. The component instance indentity is dependent on the state of the component. This method will throw a runtime exception if invoked prior to registering an implementation for the component.

Throws:
WrapperException - Wraps the actual exception thrown while obtaining the concrete component instance.

newInstance

public java.lang.Object newInstance()
Returns a new concrete instance of this component.

isInDispatchingState

public boolean isInDispatchingState()
Returns:
true If the component is in dispatching state and false otherwise.
